stories.text:
I am looking for a software to mac that visualize a dependency graph of my base-code in c#.

My goal is to have a quick way to find bad dependencies in my code and refactor them.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to visualize the dependency graphs of my codebase?

stories.text: My moms account got hit by a clone attack where someone cloned her account and is now impersonating her. It’s there any way to force Facebook to take action using dmca request on pictures or other means?
stories.title: Ask HN: Fighting Facebook Clone Scammers

stories.text:
Hi folks, I’m curious if your teams have adopted Twirp (https://twitchtv.github.io/twirp/docs/intro.html) for inter service communication. How has your experience been with it? What are some pain points you’ve had to overcome tabooed adopting it? And while operating Twirp services? What benefits have you realised by adopting Twirp?

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Are you using Twirp for internal service communication?
